```suggestion
java -jar bazel-bin/navigator/backend/navigator-binary_deploy.jar server
```

`navigator.conf` is not the default config file name. SDK projects use `navigator.conf`, Navigator uses `ui-backend.conf` by default. I would leave the option out and rely on users reading the Navigator output in case the config file is missing.
I changed it because the previous point asks the user to create the `navigator.conf` file. Should I change that instead to `ui-backend.conf`?
Ah my bad, I did not realize the readme asks you to create a config file with a non-default name. Ignore this comment, your change is good.
